trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_SEQ_00<tab>N'tanmo needs help keeping the city a bright and cheery place.
TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_SEQ_01<tab>Unable to leave her post, N'tanmo has tasked you with inspecting the streetlamps about town. Refill them with streetlamp oil lest they run dry.
TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_SEQ_02<tab>You have refilled all of the guttering streetlamps. Speak with Sisipu at the Fishermen's Guild to receive more streetlamp oil.

TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_SEQ_03<tab>You learn that N'tanmo has a habit of foisting her duties upon fledgling adventurers, much to Sisipu's disapproval. However, you sense that there is more to Sisipu's frustrations than meets the eye.
TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_TODO_00<tab>Refill guttering streetlamps with streetlamp oil.
TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sisipu at the Fishermen's Guild.

TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_NTANMO_000_0<tab>Sounds like you're already in the Yellowjackets' good graces. You truly are a model adventurer─a paragon among your fellows! ...Um, do you think you could do me a favor?

TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_NTANMO_000_1<tab>You see, I'm supposed to go and fill up all the streetlamps with oil so that they'll stay lit through the night. But thanks to this business of missing people, I can't simply up and leave my post.
TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_NTANMO_000_2<tab>If you could tend to the streetlamps in my stead, I'd be <var 1A 02 /var>eternally<var 1A 01 /var> grateful.
TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_NTANMO_000_3<tab>Oh, and when you're finished, please fetch more oil from Sisipu in the Fishermen's Guild. We're running low here, and she has care of our stores.
TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_SISIPU_000_10<tab>...You're doing <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>!? <sigh> What am I to do with that girl?
TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_SISIPU_000_11<tab>She has the nerve to ask me for work, twaddlin' tripe about her savings, only to foist it on the first adventurer that comes along!

TEXT_SUBSEA010_00120_SISIPU_000_12<tab>Being young and pretty does <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> give you license to shirk responsibility! Aye, she'll get her oil all right...and a piece of my mind to boot!
